[html]

Home 2

Just one shortcode to display all menus on homepage

No need for menu manager. Just create menu, add chapter if needed with book Homepage, set correct order (in page list only, so page title is filled). For this section title was tinymce snippet used, it is part of page content. 

If you don't see icons correctly, it is core issue #4798. The demo is running on 2.3.3git version.

{SETSTYLE=none}{BOOK_MENUS: name=homepage}

[/html]
